sys_script.name: testRest

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_842885_country_m_country_addresses</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>testRest</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    try {
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_842885_demograph.NationalityData', 'Default GET');
        var name = current.name;
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('name', name);

        var response = r.execute();
        var responseBody = response.getBody();
        var responseObj = JSON.parse(responseBody);
        current.name = responseObj.name;
        var countryObj = responseObj.country;
        var objOne = countryObj[0];
        var objTwo = countryObj[1];
        var objThree = countryObj[2];
        current.alpha_2 = objOne.country_id;
//         current.most_likely_country_probability = objOne.probability;
//         current.second_most_likely_country_code = objTwo.country_id;
//         current.second_most_likely_country_probability = objTwo.probability;
//         current.third_most_likely_country_code = objThree.country_id;
//         current.third_most_likely_country_probability = objThree.probability;
        current.update();
        var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
    } catch (ex) {
        var message = ex.message;
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-25 20:27:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2fc408a32f341510f98fa55df699b606</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>testRest</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Country Management" source="x_842885_country_m">5b303f1f2fb01510f98fa55df699b6eb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Country Management">5b303f1f2fb01510f98fa55df699b6eb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2fc408a32f341510f98fa55df699b606</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-26 10:48:10</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2fc408a32f341510f98fa55df699b606"/></record_update>
